Issue.creator: JIRAUSER21212
Issue.summary: InvalidStructureException : A value being processed is not valid error 113
Issue.description: When i call indy_prover_create_proof via ARIES framework .net that call indy SDK .net that call libindy.dll (Windows 10), i get InvalidStructureException : A value being processed is not valid. The SDK internal code is 113 but i don't know why?
